title: Major Bug : Cannot invite players to lobby
body: Cannot invite players into lobby. Been 2 hours without a fix. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Bump, I am stuck in a lobby from last night and i cannot leave it to play any other games.
i have tried getting the other players from the old lobby to invite me to a new lobby, i have also repaired my client. i have done a bug report but no response from riot as of yet.

 PLEASE HELP <3
Signed, Reformed bronzey : A Suh Dud
